Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: RESULTS : CIN was detected in 18 / 90 ( 20 % ) patients .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| CIN (Cystitis Induced by NSAIDs) |

Note: CIN is not a chemical in the traditional sense, but it is a condition caused by certain chemicals (NSAIDs) and is often referred to in medical literature.
